changeSet.author: Jory Stone, Roger Boykin
changeSet.comment: Add Race data

column.name: Description
column.value: The Skumm are colonies of highly evolved algae who were once content to simply float on the surface of their watery planet. When a Decapodian scouting expedition set down on their home planet, the Skumm learned that aliens existed in their universe. An inquisitive people, the Skumm sent an ambassador to greet the aliens. The Skumm watched in horror as the Decapodian captain consumed their diplomat with a giant straw! Thus began the Skumm-Crab War. The two races have learned a modicum of restraint since the war concluded but they still do not trust each other.

column.name: Description
column.value: Although slow and ponderous, these crab-like aliens were the first to achieve interstellar travel in this sector. They were also the first to start an interstellar war when one of their captains consumed the ambassador representing the Skumm nation during a scouting expedition to system D2O. Although the resulting Skumm-Crab War has officially concluded, bad blood exists between the two races to this day.

column.name: Description
column.value: Binarites are artificial intelligences that were created by the Schrodinoids to run their space ships. A schism developed between the Binarites and their masters when the Schrodinoids began to require their machine slaves to show homage to their prophet known as The Uncertain One. As ardent proponents of relativistic physics, the Schrodinoids found this worship of quantum mechanics highly unsettling. The Binarites won their freedom in the resulting revolution. Now the Binarites seek only to bring logic to an illogical universe.

column.name: Description
column.value: Schrodinoids are feline bipeds who gained dominance over the other life forms in the Quantum 5 system. While many other races have used physics to reach the stars, Schrodinoids are unique because their belief in quantum mechanics grew so strong that it became their dominant religion. The combination of feline appearance and fanatical belief in quantum mechanics led to their being nicknamed - Schrodinger’s Kitties.

column.name: Description
column.value: Humans are the relative newcomers to this sector of space. The majority of humans are located in the densely populated Sol system, but during recent years, more humans have decided to leave their home system and try their luck out here. Most of these immigrant humans want nothing to do with others of their own species, having endured the pervasive overcrowding for most of their lives.

changeSet.author: Jory Stone
changeSet.comment: Changing the RaceId and ShipId columns on the NPC table to allow NULLs, this will allow 'virtual' NPC that do not have a position. Also fixing the Bounty and Badness columns to not allow NULLs.

changeSet.author: Jory Stone
changeSet.comment: Adding Description properties to table columns
changeSet.sql: IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'User', N'COLUMN',N'Email')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'used for login and administrative contact' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'User', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'Email' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'User', N'COLUMN',N'UserName')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'used for login' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'User', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'UserName' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'User', N'COLUMN',N'Validated')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'Flag to signal if the User has Validated their e-mail address by clicking on the link' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'User', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'Validated' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'User', N'COLUMN',N'Active')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'Flag to signal if User is active and can login' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'User', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'Active' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'User', N'COLUMN',N'Admin')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'true for administrators, default to false' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'User', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'Admin' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'User', N'COLUMN',N'Password')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'sha1 salted hash base 64 coded' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'User', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'Password' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'User', N'COLUMN',N'LastVerificationSent')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'date last email verification was sent' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'User', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'LastVerificationSent' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'User', N'COLUMN',N'Joined')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'date user registers' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'User', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'Joined' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'Good', N'COLUMN',N'BasePrice')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'price, unmodified by PriceMultiplier' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'Good', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'BasePrice' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'JumpDrive', N'COLUMN',N'Speed')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'The Speed or Charge Time of the JumpDrive' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'JumpDrive', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'Speed' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'JumpDrive', N'COLUMN',N'Range')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'The radius length of a circle depicting systems in range.' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'JumpDrive', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'Range' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'JumpDrive', N'COLUMN',N'CargoCost')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'How many cargo spaces the drive occupies.' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'JumpDrive', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'CargoCost' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'JumpDrive', N'COLUMN',N'BasePrice')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'price, unmodified by PriceMultiplier' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'JumpDrive', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'BasePrice' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'NpcType', N'COLUMN',N'NpcTypeId')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'Pirate, Trader, or Police?' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'NpcType', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'NpcTypeId' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'Shield', N'COLUMN',N'Strength')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'defensive value, higher is better' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'Shield', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'Strength' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'Shield', N'COLUMN',N'BasePrice')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'price, unmodified by PriceMultiplier' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'Shield', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'BasePrice' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'Shield', N'COLUMN',N'CargoCost')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'How many cargo spaces the shield occupies.' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'Shield', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'CargoCost' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'System', N'COLUMN',N'PositionX')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'X-coordinate of system, 0 = upper left, no negative values' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'System', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'PositionX' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'System', N'COLUMN',N'PositionY')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'Y-coordinate of system, 0 = upper left, no negative values' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'System', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'PositionY' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'System', N'COLUMN',N'HasBank')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'1= has a bank, 0 = no bank' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'System', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'HasBank' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'Weapon', N'COLUMN',N'Power')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'attack strength' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'Weapon', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'Power' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'Weapon', N'COLUMN',N'TurnCost')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'turn units consumed by firing' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'Weapon', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'TurnCost' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'Weapon', N'COLUMN',N'CargoCost')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'number of cargo spaces used by weapon' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'Weapon', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'CargoCost' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'Weapon', N'COLUMN',N'BasePrice')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'price, unmodified by PriceMultiplier' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'Weapon', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'BasePrice' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'Player', N'COLUMN',N'UserId')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'User who owns this player character' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'Player', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'UserId' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'Player', N'COLUMN',N'Name')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'Player''s name' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'Player', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'Name' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'Player', N'COLUMN',N'Reputation')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'high positive = good, 0 = neutral, low negative = bad' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'Player', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'Reputation' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'Player', N'COLUMN',N'BankCredits')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'player credits in bank' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'Player', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'BankCredits' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'Player', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'CashCredits' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'Player', N'COLUMN',N'TimePlayed')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'seconds since player was created' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'Player', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'TimePlayed' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM credits + items' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'Player', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'NetWorth' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM collected' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'Player', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'BountyTotal' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM bounty placed on player' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'Player', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'HighestBounty' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'Player', N'COLUMN',N'ShipsDestroyed')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'Opponent''s Destroyed' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'Player', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'ShipsDestroyed' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'Player', N'COLUMN',N'ForcedSurrenders')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'Surrendered Opponents' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'Player', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'ForcedSurrenders' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'Player', N'COLUMN',N'ForcedFlees')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'Fled Opponents' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'Player', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'ForcedFlees' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'Player', N'COLUMN',N'CargoLootedWorth')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'Captured Cargo' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'Player', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'CargoLootedWorth' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'Player', N'COLUMN',N'ShipsLost')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'Ships Lost in Combat' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'Player', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'ShipsLost' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'Player', N'COLUMN',N'SurrenderCount')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'Times Surrendered' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'Player', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'SurrenderCount' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'Player', N'COLUMN',N'FleeCount')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'Times Fled' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'Player', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'FleeCount' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'Player', N'COLUMN',N'CargoLostWorth')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'Lost Cargo' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'Player', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'CargoLostWorth' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'Player', N'COLUMN',N'Alive')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'True = hasn''t reached time limit, False = past time limit' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'Player', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'Alive' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'Message', N'COLUMN',N'Content')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'body of the message' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'Message', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'Content' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'Message', N'COLUMN',N'Received')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'1 = message received, 0 = message not received' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'Message', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'Received' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'IgnoreList', N'COLUMN',N'AntiFriendId')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'UserId of blocked user' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'IgnoreList', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'AntiFriendId' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'BuddyList', N'COLUMN',N'FriendId')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'User id of the buddy on the buddy list' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'BuddyList', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'FriendId' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'SystemGood', N'COLUMN',N'PriceMultiplier')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'used to calculate price by adjusting base price' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'SystemGood', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'PriceMultiplier' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'SystemGood', N'COLUMN',N'ProductionFactor')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'0 = not produced, 1 = max produced' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'SystemGood', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'ProductionFactor' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'SystemGood', N'COLUMN',N'ConsumptionFactor')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'0 = not consumed, 1 = max consumed' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'SystemGood', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'ConsumptionFactor' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'BaseShip', N'COLUMN',N'BasePrice')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'price, unmodified by PriceMultiplier' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'BaseShip', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'BasePrice' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'SystemJumpDriveUpgrade', N'COLUMN',N'PriceMultiplier')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'used to calculate price by adjusting base price' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'SystemJumpDriveUpgrade', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'PriceMultiplier' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'Ship', N'COLUMN',N'SystemId')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'CurrentSystemId is the system the ship is currently in.' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'Ship', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'SystemId' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'Ship', N'COLUMN',N'WeaponId')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'type of weapon used by ship' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'Ship', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'WeaponId' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'Ship', N'COLUMN',N'JumpDriveId')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'type of jumpDrive used by ship' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'Ship', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'JumpDriveId' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'Ship', N'COLUMN',N'ShieldId')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'type of shield used by ship' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'Ship', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'ShieldId' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'Ship', N'COLUMN',N'DamageEngine')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'Percentage damaged, 0 = no damage, 100 = engine destroyed' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'Ship', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'DamageEngine' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'Ship', N'COLUMN',N'DamageWeapon')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'Percentage damaged, 0 = no damage, 100 = weapon destroyed' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'Ship', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'DamageWeapon' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'Ship', N'COLUMN',N'DamageShield')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'Percentage damaged, 0 = no damage, 100 = shield destroyed' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'Ship', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'DamageShield' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'Ship', N'COLUMN',N'DamageHull')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'Percentage damaged, 0 = no damage, 100 = ship destroyed' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'Ship', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'DamageHull' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'Ship', N'COLUMN',N'TargetSystemId')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'TargetSystemId is the destination system' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'Ship', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'TargetSystemId' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'Ship', N'COLUMN',N'CurrentJumpDriveCharge')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'0 = empty, 100 = full charge' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'Ship', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'CurrentJumpDriveCharge' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'Npc', N'COLUMN',N'NpcTypeId')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'Is the NPC a pirate, trader, or police type?' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'Npc', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'NpcTypeId' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'Npc', N'COLUMN',N'Credits')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'Cash credits carried on ship' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'Npc', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'Credits' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'Npc', N'COLUMN',N'Badness')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'0 = good, high positive = evil, this measures potential to attack players' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'Npc', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'Badness' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'Npc', N'COLUMN',N'Bounty')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'if NPC surrenders or is destroyed, victor receives this many credits' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'Npc', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'Bounty' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'SystemShieldUpgrade', N'COLUMN',N'PriceMultiplier')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'used to calculate price by adjusting base price' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'SystemShieldUpgrade', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'PriceMultiplier' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'InProgressCombat', N'COLUMN',N'Turn')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'Current player turn. 0 = attacker, 1 = defender.' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'InProgressCombat', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'Turn' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'InProgressCombat', N'COLUMN',N'TurnPointsLeft')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'Turn points remaining for current player' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'InProgressCombat', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'TurnPointsLeft' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'InProgressCombat', N'COLUMN',N'Surrender')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'Surrender is the flag that a player is surrendering. If the player starts a turn and the surrender flag is set, the other player has surrendered. If the player does not accept the surrender, the flag is reset and combat continues.' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'InProgressCombat', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'Surrender' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'InProgressCombat', N'COLUMN',N'JettisonCargo')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'The JettisonCargo flag works the same way as the Surrender flag. If the player chooses not to pickup the cargo, the cargo from the other player''s ship is deleted from the database.' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'InProgressCombat', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'JettisonCargo' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'Race', N'COLUMN',N'Weapons')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'positive = stronger weapon power than average, 0 = average, negative = weaker weapon power than average' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'Race', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'Weapons' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'Race', N'COLUMN',N'Shields')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'positive = stronger shields than average, 0 = average, negative = weaker shields than average' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'Race', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'Shields' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'Race', N'COLUMN',N'Engine')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'positive = faster charge rate than average, 0 = average, negative = slower charge rate than average' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'Race', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'Engine' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'Race', N'COLUMN',N'Accuracy')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'positive = more accurate than average, 0 = average, negative = less accurate than average' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'Race', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'Accuracy' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'Race', N'COLUMN',N'RacialEnemyId')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'racial enemies charge more and pay less for goods, more inclined to attack' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'Race', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'RacialEnemyId' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'Race', N'COLUMN',N'RacialPreferenceId')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'racial preferences charge less and pay more for goods, less inclined to attack' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'Race', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'RacialPreferenceId' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'Race', N'COLUMN',N'Description')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'background on a particular race' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'Race', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'Description' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'Race', N'COLUMN',N'HomeSystemId')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'indicates which system the race originated from' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'Race', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'HomeSystemId' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'SystemShip', N'COLUMN',N'PriceMultiplier')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'used to calculate price by adjusting base price' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'SystemShip', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'PriceMultiplier' IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo', N'TABLE',N'SystemWeaponUpgrade', N'COLUMN',N'PriceMultiplier')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'used to calculate price by adjusting base price' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'SystemWeaponUpgrade', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'PriceMultiplier'

changeSet.author: Roger Boykin
changeSet.comment: Adding and populating RaceId column to System Table

changeSet.author: Roger Boykin
changeSet.comment: Adding nullable=false to RaceId column in System Table

changeSet.author: Roger Boykin
changeSet.comment: Making changes to JumpDrive Table

changeSet.author: Jory Stone
changeSet.comment: Making the RaceId column not nullable in the System table. Adding not null constraint to the Password column in the User table.

changeSet.author: Jory Stone
changeSet.comment: Adding Unique Constraint to the Player table

changeSet.author: Jory Stone
changeSet.comment: Adding Subject column to the Message table

changeSet.author: Jory Stone
changeSet.comment: Adding RecipientUserVisible and SenderUserVisible column to the Message table

changeSet.author: Jory Stone
changeSet.comment: Adding Unique constraints to the InProgressCombat table to try to limit ships to one combat

changeSet.author: Jory Stone
changeSet.comment: Drop InProgressCombat table and re-create as Combat table

changeSet.author: Jory Stone
changeSet.comment: Dropping Complete column and adding Status column to the Combat table

changeSet.author: Jory Stone
changeSet.comment: Dropped Unique index on Player Name column.

changeSet.author: Roger Boykin
changeSet.comment: Adding Demand column to SystemGood Table. Making changes to SystemGood Table to stabilize the economy.

changeSet.author: Roger Boykin
changeSet.comment: Adding description to Demand column in SystemGood table.
changeSet.sql:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty(N'MS_Description' , N'SCHEMA',N'dbo',
N'TABLE',N'SystemGood', N'COLUMN',N'Demand')) EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'0=prohibited, 1=average, 2=increased,
3=decreased' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'SystemGood',
@level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'Demand'

changeSet.author: Roger Boykin
changeSet.comment: Setting the good quantities

changeSet.author: Roger Boykin
changeSet.comment: Inserting missing SystemGood rows. Deleting rows where demand = prohibited except 4-9.

changeSet.author: Jory Stone
changeSet.comment: Renamed Speed column to ChargeTime on the JumpDrive table. This changes the meaning from a power factor to the number of seconds it takes to jump.

changeSet.author: Jory Stone
changeSet.comment: Create the CombatGood table to track goods picked up in combat

changeSet.author: Jory Stone
changeSet.comment: Changed the CurrentJumpDriveCharge column on the Ship table to NOT NULL. Unsure why it was marked as nullable.

changeSet.author: Jory Stone
changeSet.comment: Created indexes on Player and ShipGood table to help query speed.

changeSet.author: Jory Stone
changeSet.comment: Adding LastActionTime column on the Combat table to track the time since the last action taken during a turn. This will be used to enforce a time limit on turn actions.

changeSet.author: Jory Stone
changeSet.comment: Adding LootedCredits column on the Combat table to track the amount of credits looted.

changeSet.author: Jory Stone
changeSet.comment: Renamed LootedCredits column on the Combat table to CreditsLooted.

changeSet.author: Jory Stone
changeSet.comment: Renamed JettisonCargo column on the Combat table to CargoJettisoned.

changeSet.author: Jory Stone
changeSet.comment: Renamed Surrender column on the Combat table to Surrendered.

changeSet.author: Roger Boykin
changeSet.comment: Adding spaces to good names. Removing human bonus and penalties. Making RacialEnemyId nullable.

column.name: Description
column.value: Humans are smarter than some alien species and dumber than others. Human-based technology produces ship components that are strictly average in terms of performance. All this mediocrity makes Humans the perfect race to pick for users who do not wish to be troubled by all those pesky bonuses and penalties that plague the other races.

changeSet.author: Jory Stone
changeSet.comment: Adding a special Cleaner NPCs to cleanup after inactive users.

changeSet.author: Jory Stone

delete.where: NType IN (4, 5, 6) AND ShipId IS NULL

changeSet.author: Jory Stone
changeSet.comment: Loading new Pirate names created by Caleb

changeSet.author: Jory Stone
changeSet.comment: Creating CHECK constraint on Combat table to ensure every ship is in only one combat at a time
changeSet.createProcedure: CREATE FUNCTION dbo.CombatsInProgress(@shipId int) RETURNS int AS BEGIN -- Get the number of in-progress combats this ship is in DECLARE @retval int SELECT @retval = COUNT(*) FROM Combat c WHERE c.Status = 0 AND (c.AttackerShipId = @shipId OR c.DefenderShipId = @shipId) RETURN @retval END
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE Combat ADD CONSTRAINT CombatInProgress CHECK (dbo.CombatsInProgress(AttackerShipId) < 2 AND dbo.CombatsInProgress(DefenderShipId) < 2)
